Articles.Content: Create a steerable ground vehicle that can launch a space plane. The plane must be capable of standard take offs and landings, no VTOLS!

hehe ... I sort off did that a week ago (though strictly speaking I didn\'t build the launcher)

[Kerbal Space Program - Mobile Launcher](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6_VgZaGsjR4#)

This is the plane it launches. It can take off and land normally as shown in the vid below.

[Landing made easy in Kerbal Space Program](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cRiflB1OC7g#)

I got an orbiter to mobile verti-launch.

Uploading video soon.

I piloted mine manually.

Alright my first challenge.

First off, I had a lot of fun (And a bit of frustration) doing this one, thanks to the creator of the challenge for creating this.

Second off... Mods: If you want to use this design yourself, please do, all you need is the Damned Robotics pack, I used the rotaters for the engine steering as well as the hinges and the hydraulic cylinders for the catapult.

Now here\'s some screenshots of the actual flight, in the VAB, landing, and such.

> 
> First up, VAB shot (Actually Spaceplane Hangar, bad habit):
> 
> ![a>]()
> 
> 
> 

Now, on the runway ready to move to a new launch site:

> ![screenshot8qi.png](http://img713.imageshack.us/img713/1466/screenshot8qi.png)

On the way to the new launch site:

> ![screenshot10f.png](http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/3648/screenshot10f.png)

Wait, we\'ve found a good launch site so let\'s launch:

> ![screenshot12v.png](http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/4148/screenshot12v.png)

Now let\'s drop that booster

> ![screenshot16j.png](http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/6315/screenshot16j.png)

And land:

> ![screenshot20r.png](http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/6418/screenshot20r.png)

A few warnings:

1. Don\'t go too fast with the launch vehicle, it can reach 60 m/s but it collapses very easily at that speed.

2. Watch out when you adjust the hinges on the plane for takeoff, right is good, left is bad.

3. That booster is there to keep the plane moving while the jet engine warms up, make sure the throttle is at max when you launch.

4. There\'s a chance the booster will knock your engine off when you decouple, be careful, you can make an unpowered landing though.

And that\'s it hope you all enjoyed it, and have fun using it!

> 
> > ![ds-skydiver-1.jpg](http://www.aiai.ed.ac.uk/~bat/GA/OT-MODEL/ds-skydiver-1.jpg)

What is that plane (or that game) ?

> 
> What is that plane (or that game) ?

SkyDiver from UFO [TV series]. The submarine [Diver (Number)] tilts up, and the fighter [sky (Number)] JATO launches out of the water to go blow up some aliens.

I thought Damnyoujapan\'s entry looked like a landgoing version of it.
